        public void setFrameCounter(int frameCounter)

      • setGameOverTime

        public void setGameOverTime(int time)

      • manageGameFlow

        public void manageGameFlow()
        Manage the overall game flow.

        This is the main method of the Game class. It manages the overall game flow including the movement of Waka, the movement of ghosts, the collision between Waka and ghosts, eating fruits of Waka, switching modes, timing the game and wining or losing of the game.

      • drawWalls

        public void drawWalls()
        Draw walls

      • drawFruits

        public void drawFruits()
        Draw fruits.

        Draw those fruits that are not eatten by Waka

      • drawWaka

        public void drawWaka()
        Draw Waka.

        Handle the graphics for Waka.

        Waka switches between open mouth and closed mouth for every 8 frames.

        Waka's mouth is always pointing to the direction it is currently moving.

      • drawWakaLives

        public void drawWakaLives()
        Draw Waka's lives at bottoms left corner of the window.

      • drawGhosts

        public void drawGhosts()
        Draw ghosts.

        If in FRIGHTENED mode, all ghosts have the same sprite.

        If they are removed by Waka in FRIGHTENED mode, they will not be drawn.

      • eatFruit

        public void eatFruit()
        When Waka is at the same grid as fruit, fruit is eaten by Waka

      • moveWaka

        public void moveWaka()
        Manage the movement of Waka

        First, it checks if the next direction (set by users pressing keys) is movable. If it is movable, then set the current direction to it. If not, then continue moving in its current direction.

        Second, it checks if it is movable if it moves in the current direction. If it is movable, then move. If not, then stop.

      • manageModes

        public void manageModes()
        Manage the modes of the game.

        If the time for the current mode is ended, switch to the other mode.

      • moveGhost

        public void moveGhost()
        Manage the movement of ghosts.

      • isFrightenedEnd

        public boolean isFrightenedEnd()
        Check if FRIGHTENED mode has ended.

        Return true if FRIGHTENED mode has eneded. Otherwise, return false.

        返回:
        boolean

      • collide

        public void collide()
        Handles collision

        If Waka collides with a ghost, it will lose a life and Waka and all the ghosts will go back to their initial positions.

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision()
        Handle collision logic.

        Waka and ghosts will collide if either of the 4 corners of their sprites overlap.

      • isCollectAllFruits

        public boolean isCollectAllFruits()
        Check if all the fruits in the map have been collected by Waka
        返回:
        (boolean) Return true if all the fruits have been collected by Waka. Otherwise, return false.

      • displayWinScreen

        public void displayWinScreen()
        Render the YOU WIN screen

        Note: To ensure it it displays properly, users must have PressStart2P-Regular font installed in their computers.

      • displayLoseScreen

        public void displayLoseScreen()
        Render the GAME OVER screen

        Note: To ensure it it displays properly, users must have PressStart2P-Regular font installed in their computers.

      • handleGameEnd

        public void handleGameEnd()
        Handle the time for displaying the game ending screen.

        If the game is won or lost, display the win or lose screen for 10 seconds. If 10 seconds have passed, it will restart the game.

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Restart the game.

        Restart the game by resetting all the elements, with all Fruit, SuperFruit, Ghosts, and lives restored.
